verbose_text: The stereotactic injection of the VMAT2 lentivirus in the PFC of P25 aVMAT2cKO mice induced the re-expression of VMAT2, as demonstrated by means of WB analysis and, remarkably, fully rescued basal extracellular DA levels in the PFC (n = 4 mice each group, one way ANOVA F = 34, * * * p < 0.0001 followed by Tukey 's posthoc test; Fig. XREF_FIG).
